#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    int n,k;
	    cin>>n>>k;
	    int a;
	    long long ans=1;
	    if(k==0||n==1||k==n)
	    cout<<1<<endl;
	    else if(k==n-1||k==1)
	    cout<<n<<endl;
	    else if(n<k)
	    cout<<-1<<endl;
	    else
	    {
	        if(n-k>k)
	        a=k;
	        else if(n-k<=k)
	        a=n-k;
	        int i;
	        for(i=1; i<=a; i++)
	        ans=ans*(n+1-i)/i;
	        
	        cout<<ans<<endl;
	    }
	}
	
	return 0;
}
